column1: Snacks—impact on caloric intake of substituting fruits and vegetables for other snack foods

column23: Average change in calories of replacing each snack with all fruits and vegetables

column1: Average change in calories of replacing all snack foods with a specific fruit or vegetable
Note: A negative sign means that caloric intake increases when the snack is replaced with a fruit or vegetable.
Source:  Calculated by ERS, USDA using data on calories from USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference, Release 24.
